conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model successfully translates the 2D floor plan into a volumetric isometric cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clearly defined wall thickness, interior volumes, and a perfect isometric viewing angle.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High layout fidelity. All rooms (Bed-1, Bed-2, Living/Dining, Kitchen, Utility, Toilets) are present and in correct configuration. Wall openings and glass partitions for decks are accurately placed.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the plan perfectly, including specific kitchen appliances, bathroom fixtures, and living room furniture.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with logical lighting. Absence of text labels is a plus for clarity, though materials are somewhat simplified.

detected_errors.description: Minor simplification of window glazing frames compared to the architectural plan's detailed indications.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and geometrically accurate 3D isometric conversion that retains all structural and interior details from the 2D source.
